name: Red Comrades Save the Galaxy: Reloaded
description: Vasily Ivanovich Chapaev and his fellow aide Petka realize that someone has stolen the Red banner from the HQ. Although it's not the end of the story yet! Somewhere on the moon, legions of alien invaders prepare to conquer Earth. But could such a little thing really give a scare to the Red Army heroes?
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Процессор: 2.2 GHz processor Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Video 512 MB RAM DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 3 GB

reviews.review_text: Red Comrades Save the Galaxy is retro looking point & click adventure that reminds of ooold Russian Folk Tales. I would probably love it if it had full english audio, but this way reading subtitles all the time is too distracting.  Pro's: +Beautiful retro graphic +Funny as hell +Cheap  Con's: -Fully enjoyable only to people who understand Russian -To many interaction options

Russian adventure game set in Russian civil war. Except alcoholic beverage and boobies.  + Fascinating story + Great humour + Russian voice acting + Suitable music  - Some wierd gaps/pauses in middle of dialogs - Some sprites are drawn in worse quality than others - Minor errors in some translations/mouse over labels  Overall rating ☭/☭.
